Kʼo pa ja tijobʼal ri wikaqʼ .
Kʼo pa ja tijobʼal ri w>ikaqʼ .

Xinalax pa jun qʼij ubʼiʼ wajxaqibʼ Noʼj .
X>in>alax pa jun qʼij u>bʼiʼ wajxaqibʼ Noʼj .

Xintik qʼax chi uwach ri ja .
X>in>tik qʼax chi u>wach ri ja .

Xqarqat ri akʼ are chiʼ xsikʼowik .
X>qarqat ri akʼ are chiʼ x>sikʼow>ik .

Oj kʼo pa le roʼch le a Wel .
Oj kʼo pa le r>oʼch le a Wel .

We man je kabʼan chike , kabʼison le rajaw tuj .
We man je k>a>bʼan chi>k>e , ka>bʼison le r>ajaw tuj .

Xinloqʼ jun kʼakʼ ukaʼ ri numiʼal .
X>in>loqʼ jun kʼakʼ u>kaʼ ri nu>miʼal .

Jawi kʼo wi le wuj re le qatijonik ?
Jawi kʼo wi le wuj r>e le qa>tijonik ?
